author: News18
title: Side Effects Of Eating Potato Daily
text:
Side Effects Of Eating Potato Daily
Producer: Bhaswati Sengupta
January 30, 2025
Are you someone who incorporates potatoes in every meal?
Though this vegetable has several health benefits, eating too much of this starchy root vegetable can also be harmful to your health.
Weight Gain
Potatoes are high in carbohydrates and calories. Regular consumption of fried and heavily buttered potatoes can lead to weight gain.
High Blood Sugar
This starchy root vegetable has a high glycemic index, which can cause a rapid increase in blood sugar levels. It may complicate blood sugar management and is concerning for individuals with diabetes.
Digestive Issues
Eating potatoes regularly can lead to digestive discomfort, including bloating and gas. The presence of resistant starch in raw potatoes ferments in the large intestine and causes gastrointestinal symptoms.
Nutritional Imbalance
Potatoes do not offer a complete nutritional profile. Relying on the vegetable as a staple food may lead to lack of dietary diversity.
Risk Of Toxicity
Consuming damaged or improperly stored potatoes can expose individuals to toxic compounds like solanine and acrylamide. They can cause symptoms like headaches, nausea and digestive issues.
Image: Pexels
